body_html:
I tried both allow_growth and the fraction config parameters down until 0.1 but still getting a black screen.. a bit confused as to why that is the case. I can't log anything, since as soon as I hit enter on sess = tf.Session(config = config) the screen crashes. Any alternatives? I thought my gpu was compatible, and all I was computing is to print hello world ..

I have a laptop with intel integrated gpu, but from my search it seems I can use that as a display whilst I compute with the nvidia GPU.

body:
I tried both allow_growth  and the fraction config parameters down until 0.1 but still getting a black screen..  a bit confused as to why that is the case. I can't log anything, since as soon as I hit enter on sess = tf.Session(config = config) the screen crashes.  Any alternatives? I thought my gpu was compatible, and all I was computing is to print hello world ..

I have a laptop with intel integrated gpu, but from my search it seems I can use that as a display whilst I compute with the nvidia GPU.
